## IJControllerComponent interface

控制器组件接口. 继承于 IJControllerItem 包含旋转控制器、偏移控制器等

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface IJControllerComponent extends IJControllerItem 
```
**Extends:** [IJControllerItem](./j-html-design-editor.ijcontrolleritem.md)

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [isEditor](./j-html-design-editor.ijcontrollercomponent.iseditor.md) |  | boolean | 是否是编辑态 |
|  [items](./j-html-design-editor.ijcontrollercomponent.items.md) |  | [IJControllerItem](./j-html-design-editor.ijcontrolleritem.md)<!-- -->\[\] | 控制器项的集合 |
|  [paddingSize](./j-html-design-editor.ijcontrollercomponent.paddingsize.md) |  | number | 控制器的内边距大小 |
|  [rotateItem](./j-html-design-editor.ijcontrollercomponent.rotateitem.md) |  | [IJControllerItem](./j-html-design-editor.ijcontrolleritem.md) | 控制旋转的控制器项 |
|  [skewItem](./j-html-design-editor.ijcontrollercomponent.skewitem.md) |  | [IJControllerItem](./j-html-design-editor.ijcontrolleritem.md) | 控制偏移的控制器项 |
|  [target](./j-html-design-editor.ijcontrollercomponent.target.md) |  | [IJElement](./j-html-design-editor.ijelement.md) \| undefined | 控制器关联的目标元素 |
